data.name: Trippy Tavern
data.detailed_description:
FEATURES

  • Colorful, unique drinks -- the more you progress, the more recipes you will learn.
  • After each round, spin for a random mod or event that will always keep the game unique and challenging.
  • Avoid permadeath! If you fail to pay your rent, you will lose the run and have to start over!
  • Save your progress and track your run history.
  • As you play through and earn more run victories, you will unlock new unique mods that will be added to your pool.

SUMMARY

  • Work your way through rounds by serving customers to earn gold.
  • You must earn enough each round to pay your rent -- or else you're done for!
  • Save your extra gold to purchase new recipes and level up.
  • Reach the ultimate rank before you miss rent... or die :D
  • Every round will be affected by a random game mod. Tons of unique mods keep every round interesting! Some are good, some are bad, and some are just plain weird.

data.short_description: You are the bartender at Trippy Tavern, serving up colorful drinks to thirsty customers. Use your earnings to learn new recipes and rise the ranks, all while dealing with random mods every round -- some good, some bad, and everything in between! Oh, and don't forget to pay the rent...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or better
  • Additional Notes: VR only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 equivalent or better
